content.prompt: The figure shows the paths of three particles in a uniform magnetic field. Each particle has the same velocity when it enters the field, and each path is in the plane of the page. One particle has a positive charge, one has a negative charge, and one has no net charge. What is the direction of the magnetic field?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the relative masses of the particles.
It cannot be determined without knowing which paths correspond to the positively and negatively charged particles.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
